name: Mist Breaker
description:
You, my young and aspiring adventurer have been summened to his majesties court to recieve a royal quest. Not a perticular dangerous one, but a rather peculiar one.

A colony, lost in a storm has been located by a stroke of dumb luck. There is but one problem. The island and the sea surrounding it is covered in a mist. But for you, my adventurer, this should be but a small challange easily overcome.

In Mist Breaker you play a young adventurer send out by his emperor to hunt down a colony that dissappeared in a storm. Lost for years, another ship spotted traces of their ship but was unable to rescue them. Which is where you come in, driven by the urge to show yourself and figure out what happened to your father, who led the colony.

Mist Breaker is a student project game being created over the course of nine months by 6 students. The game is rather small and compact, focusing mainly on story telling and puzzles.
